roadmapItems.title: Release 1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with real-time prediction engine and data mining tools.

children.title: Real-Time Prediction Engine
children.description: Introducing real-time prediction capabilities.

children.title: Resolved latency issues in prediction queries.
children.description: Fixed problems causing latency in prediction queries.

children.title: Fixed bugs in model deployment.
children.description: Corrected errors encountered during model deployment.

children.title: Added support for streaming data predictions.
children.description: Introduced support for making predictions on streaming data.

children.title: Improved accuracy of real-time predictions.
children.description: Enhanced the accuracy of real-time prediction models.

children.title: Data Mining Tools
children.description: Providing tools for data mining and preprocessing.

children.title: Corrected issues with data preprocessing modules.
children.description: Fixed problems with data preprocessing modules.

children.title: Fixed errors in association rule mining.
children.description: Resolved issues with association rule mining algorithms.

children.title: Introduced advanced clustering algorithms.
children.description: Added new advanced clustering algorithms.

children.title: Added support for automated data cleaning.
children.description: Introduced automated data cleaning features.

roadmapItems.title: Release 1.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements for visualization options and query performance.

children.title: Advanced Visualization Options
children.description: Improving data visualization capabilities.

children.title: Resolved rendering issues in dashboard widgets.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the rendering of dashboard widgets.

children.title: Fixed bugs in interactive charting tools.
children.description: Resolved issues with interactive charting tools.

children.title: Added support for multi-dimensional visualizations.
children.description: Introduced support for visualizing data in multiple dimensions.

children.title: Improved user interface for custom dashboard creation.
children.description: Enhanced the UI for creating custom dashboards.

children.title: Enhanced Query Performance
children.description: Improving the performance of complex queries.

children.title: Corrected slow response times for complex queries.
children.description: Fixed problems causing slow response times for complex queries.

children.title: Fixed issues with query optimization.
children.description: Resolved problems with optimizing queries.

children.title: Introduced parallel query execution.
children.description: Added support for executing queries in parallel.

children.title: Added advanced indexing techniques for faster queries.
children.description: Introduced advanced indexing techniques to speed up queries.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with predictive model management, data source integration, and security.

children.title: Predictive Model Management
children.description: Introducing features for managing predictive models.

children.title: Resolved issues with model versioning.
children.description: Fixed problems with versioning of predictive models.

children.title: Fixed bugs in model training workflows.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the workflows for training models.

children.title: Added support for model comparison and selection.
children.description: Introduced features for comparing and selecting models.

children.title: Implemented automated model retraining based on new data.
children.description: Added support for automatic retraining of models when new data is available.

children.title: Integration with Data Sources
children.description: Enhancing integration capabilities with various data sources.

children.title: Corrected issues with data source connectivity.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting connectivity with data sources.

children.title: Fixed bugs in data import processes.
children.description: Resolved issues with importing data from various sources.

children.title: Added support for integration with popular data lakes.
children.description: Introduced support for integrating with popular data lakes.

children.title: Improved data synchronization with external databases.
children.description: Enhanced synchronization of data with external databases.

children.title: Security and Compliance
children.description: Improving security and compliance features.

children.title: Resolved vulnerabilities in data encryption.
children.description: Fixed security vulnerabilities in data encryption processes.

children.title: Fixed issues with user authentication.
children.description: Resolved problems with user authentication methods.

children.title: Implemented role-based access control.
children.description: Added role-based access control for better security.

children.title: Added support for GDPR and HIPAA compliance.
children.description: Introduced features to support GDPR and HIPAA compliance.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.4.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements in scalability and data pipeline automation.

children.title: Scalability Enhancements
children.description: Improving scalability to handle higher loads.

children.title: Resolved performance issues under high load.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting performance under high load conditions.

children.title: Fixed bugs in distributed computing framework.
children.description: Resolved issues with the distributed computing framework.

children.title: Improved horizontal scaling capabilities.
children.description: Enhanced capabilities for horizontal scaling.

children.title: Added support for auto-scaling based on workload.
children.description: Introduced auto-scaling features to adjust based on workload.

children.title: Data Pipeline Automation
children.description: Automating data pipeline processes for efficiency.

children.title: Corrected errors in ETL processes.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting ETL processes.

children.title: Fixed issues with pipeline scheduling.
children.description: Resolved issues with scheduling data pipelines.

children.title: Introduced drag-and-drop pipeline builder.
children.description: Added a drag-and-drop interface for building data pipelines.

children.title: Added support for real-time data pipelines.
children.description: Introduced support for real-time data pipelines.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with AI-powered insights, enhanced user experience, and advanced analytics.

children.title: AI-Powered Insights
children.description: Introducing AI-driven insights for better predictions and maintenance.

children.title: Resolved issues with anomaly detection algorithms.
children.description: Fixed problems with anomaly detection algorithms.

children.title: Fixed bugs in trend analysis tools.
children.description: Resolved issues with trend analysis tools.

children.title: Introduced AI-driven insights for predictive maintenance.
children.description: Added AI-driven insights to improve predictive maintenance.

children.title: Added support for natural language query interfaces.
children.description: Introduced support for querying data using natural language.

children.title: Enhanced User Experience
children.description: Improving the user experience with a new intuitive interface.

children.title: Corrected UI inconsistencies across modules.
children.description: Fixed inconsistencies in the user interface across different modules.

children.title: Fixed bugs in user customization settings.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting user customization settings.

children.title: Implemented a new intuitive user interface.
children.description: Introduced a new user interface for better usability.

children.title: Added support for personalized user dashboards.
children.description: Introduced features for creating personalized dashboards.

children.title: Advanced Analytics
children.description: Enhancing analytics capabilities with advanced tools.

children.title: Resolved issues with time series analysis.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting time series analysis.

children.title: Fixed bugs in regression model predictions.
children.description: Resolved issues with predictions from regression models.

children.title: Introduced advanced statistical analysis tools.
children.description: Added new tools for advanced statistical analysis.

children.title: Added support for deep learning model integration.
children.description: Introduced support for integrating deep learning models.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements for customizable alerts and cross-platform integration.

children.title: Customizable Alerts and Notifications
children.description: Introducing features for customizable alerts and notifications.

children.title: Resolved issues with alert configurations.
children.description: Fixed problems with configuring alerts.

children.title: Fixed bugs in notification delivery.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the delivery of notifications.

children.title: Introduced real-time alerts for predictive events.
children.description: Added real-time alerts for monitoring predictive events.

children.title: Added support for customizable notification channels.
children.description: Introduced support for configuring notification channels.

children.title: Cross-Platform Integration
children.description: Enhancing integration capabilities across multiple platforms.

children.title: Corrected issues with API integrations.
children.description: Fixed problems with integrating APIs across platforms.

children.title: Fixed bugs in cross-platform data synchronization.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting data synchronization across platforms.

children.title: Added support for integrating with IoT devices.
children.description: Introduced support for integrating with IoT devices.

children.title: Implemented seamless data flow between cloud and on-premise systems.
children.description: Added features for seamless data flow between cloud and on-premise systems.
